Ingredients.5: 1 cup packed light brown sugar, divided

Ingredients.9: 1.0 pounds fresh strawberries, hulled and quartered

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease an 11x7-inch baking dish.

Directions.2: Stir together flour, oats, walnuts, ginger, and 3/4 cup brown sugar in a bowl. Add butter; using your hands, stir mixture until moistened and coarse crumbs form.

Directions.3: Stir together cornstarch, vinegar, and remaining 1/4 cup brown sugar in a large bowl until combined, then stir in the strawberries. Transfer to the prepared baking dish and top with crumble mixture.

Directions.4: Bake in the preheated oven until the strawberries are tender, mixture is rapidly bubbling around all edges, and top is golden, 45 to 50 minutes.

Directions.5: Remove from oven and let sit at room temperature, about 10 minutes. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream.
